TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance required for cell growth and tissue repair. It is being studied as a way to prevent or decrease mucositis caused by radiation therapy.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "sulfato de zinc"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia indispensable para el crecimiento y reparación del tejido celular. Está en estudio como una forma de prevenir o disminuir la mucositis causada por la radioterapia.
